#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
int turn1,turn2=0;
scanf("%d",&turn1);
while(turn2++ < turn1)
{
 int a;
 scanf("%d",&a);
 int num=a;
 int ans=0;
 while(num!=0)
 {
  ans+=num%10;
  num/=10;            
              
 }             
 printf("%d\n",a*(1<<ans));             
}    

    
//getch();
return 0;    
}
